meanings.sent1: Her misestimation of the distance caused her to arrive late.
meanings.sent2: The misestimation of the project's cost led to financial issues.
meanings.sent3: His misestimation of the time it would take to finish the puzzle was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The misestimation of her abilities was like trying to fit a square peg in a round hole.
meanings.sent5: The misestimation of the storm's strength left them unprepared for its fury.

meanings.definition: To make an incorrect estimate or judgment.
meanings.sent1: They misestimated the number of guests and didn't have enough food.
meanings.sent2: She misestimated the time it would take to complete the assignment.
meanings.sent3: He misestimated the weight of the package and almost dropped it.
meanings.sent4: The team misestimated the opponent's strategy and lost the game.
meanings.sent5: Misestimating the depth of the water, he jumped in and hit the bottom.
